#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define sz(_v) (int)(_v).size()
#define all(_v) (_v).begin(),(_v).end()
#define pii pair<int,int>
typedef long long ll;
const int INF = 1000000000;

int main() {
    int t; cin >> t;
	while (t --) {
		int n; cin >> n;
		vector<pair<int,int> > v;
		
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) {
			int x,y; cin >> x >> y;
			v.pb(mp(x,y));
		}
		if(n == 1) {
			puts("1");
			continue;
		}
		int ans = 1;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) {
			vector<double> slopes;
			for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j ++) {
				double slp;
				if((v[i].first - v[j].first) == 0) slp = 1.0 * INF;
				else slp = (double)(v[i].second - v[j].second) / (double)(v[i].first - v[j].first);
				slopes.pb(slp);
			}
			sort(all(slopes));

			int cnt = 1;
			for (int i = 0; i < sz(slopes) - 1; i ++) {
				if(slopes[i] == slopes[i + 1]) ++ cnt;
				else cnt = 1;
				ans = max(ans,cnt);
			}
		}
		cout << ans + 1 << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
